mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM S_CMT WHERE STUD_NO = #{studNo} AND STATE = 1

SELECT S.RN, S.CMT_NO, S.STUD_NO, S.NICKNAME, S.CMT_CONTENT, S.CREATE_DATE, S.STATE, S.DEPTH, S.GROUP_NO, S.IP FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GROUP_NO DESC, DEPTH ASC, CREATE_DATE ASC) AS RN, CMT_NO, STUD_NO, NICKNAME, CMT_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, STATE, DEPTH, GROUP_NO, IP FROM S_CMT WHERE STUD_NO = #{studNo}) S LIMIT #{begin}, #{recordPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO S_CMT (STUD_NO, NICKNAME, CMT_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, STATE, DEPTH, IP, GROUP_NO) VALUES (#{studNo}, #{nickname}, #{cmtContent}, NOW(), 1, 0, #{ip}, 0)
INSERT INTO S_CMT (STUD_NO, NICKNAME, CMT_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, STATE, DEPTH, IP, GROUP_NO) VALUES (#{studNo}, #{nickname}, #{cmtContent}, NOW(), 1, 1, #{ip}, #{groupNo})
